text:
A rape victim in Bihar has asked President Pranab Mukherjee permission for mercy killing, saying she has been denied justice for nearly three months, police said on Saturday.

The woman in her early 20s, who is a resident of Saflapur village in Arwal district, has sent a letter to Mr. Mukherjee in this connection.

“The rape victim has sought permission of the President for mercy killing, as she was denied justice in her case despite knocking at the doors of all officials concerned,” a relative said.

In her petition to Mr. Mukherjee, the woman alleged that the police were not playing their role in arresting the accused.

As per the police complaint, the victim said she was raped by a close relative from her father’s side on October 22. — IANS
title: Rape victim seeks Pranab’s nod for killing self
